name: music-assistant-controls
title: Music Assistant Controls
description: Control music assistant and displays current song in the menu bar
author: yoerivd

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Menu Bar Player
commands.description: Toggle the visibility of the menu bar

commands.name: play-pause
commands.title: Toggle
commands.subtitle: Toggle play/pause
commands.description: pause the currently playing song or resume

preferences.name: host
preferences.title: Music Assistant Host
preferences.description: Enter the local address (IP, mDNS does not work well inside raycast) of your Music Assistant instance. This is usually the same as your Home Assistant URL, but with the port changed to 8095.

preferences.name: playerId
preferences.title: Default Player ID
preferences.description: Enter the player ID of your Music Assistant player to control.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
